showerReviews.reviewText: … Still no improvement here months later, photos uploaded this time around. Showers are not draining, still smells in shower area as well, both have to be a health violation. Then using a tarp with a water hose is the permanent solution for …

… , but they do a terrible job keeping the place clean. Floors are covered with dirt and hair, the locker room is a trash heap, and don’t get me started on the bathroom and shower. Bleh. You invested the money to upgrade, now take care of …

… . Edit Aug 2025.  It has gotten worse!  Still rarely paper towels or soap, trash still consistently overflowing.  But now it is filthy dirty.  Mold in showers and shower curtains.  Trash everywhere.  Hot tub water is gray and murky.

All bathroom shower heads are very bad needs to be replaced, curtain rods are rusty and need to be replaced, in toilet area needs cleaned time to time hand washing plumbing needs to be repaired, because of bad shower heads hot water big …

… on a Monday), absolutely nasty floors, and I can’t even use the restrooms they have stains and smell terrible. If paying for a membership we should have access to clean facilities and the ability to shower without being totally disgusted.

… long time, some of the issues from below get improved still the Mens areas Toilets cleaning needs improvement, the shower rooms needs to replacement of very old shower heads in the handicap bathroom they replace flexible tube- rope head …
… The staff is friendly enough but the facility is gross and I have to make sure to use hand sanitizer in the car and shower when I'm home to feel clean.

The check in was good, however, for this nice of an area the gym is a little outdated with their equipment (treadmill) Also, the showers did not have shower heads and it made for a very uncomfortable shower it was actually horrible! I love …

Wish they would clean the locker rooms; showers are always full of bandaids, wet paper on the floor, shower heads are old and calcified, and it smells intensely like a dirty foot.   But the equipment and environment are on point.

… equipment (which makes finding what you're looking for a bit easier). It's always clean in there and includes individual shower stalls in the locker room and a sauna. The staff can come off a little pushy when getting a membership, but …

showerReviews.reviewText: Fun but pricey overall. Kids enjoyed it. The staff was friendly and helpful.  The water slides are fun! The rooms are clean but in my opinion not cozy, the beds are the most comfortable thing in them. The other furniture is uncomfortable and not designed for lounging.  We did enjoy our time, but make sure you have your credit card!
